<h3 style="margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;">Details</h3>
<p align="justify">
This dataset distinguishes water bodies connected to river networks. The GRWL Database is the first global compilation of river planform geometry at a constant-frequency discharge, derived with discharge data from 3693 gauge stations, and 7376 Landsat TM, ETM+ scenes.
</p>
